import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { useLocation } from "react-router" import io from 'socket.io-client' import { Container, Row, Form, Button} from "react-bootstrap" function Room(){ const ENDPOINT = "localhost:3100" const {state} = useLocation() const [room, setRoom] = useState(state) const [user, setUser] = useState("david") useEffect(()=>{ socket = io(ENDPOINT) socket.emit('join', {name, room}, ()=>{ }) return () => { socket.emit('disconnect') socket.off } }, [ENDPOINT, room, user]) return <>

{room.roomName}

Admin : {room.admin.name}

 } export default Room
